attributes.action: STOP forced adoptions in the UK or make them RARE
attributes.additional_details: Social services are so quick to forcibly adopt babies/children and take them away from there birth family when the birth family haven't harmed the child. Please end this and make it rare for them to do!!! I agree that children should be protected from harm but alot of parents are suffering forever and they haven't ever harmed there child!
attributes.background: Please put a stop to forcibly adoption innocent families children, when more support should be given and this should only be used as a last resort and it clearly isn't. It's causing families to have mental health problems and ripping people's hearts out 😭😭

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/635578
